title: Yohane’s Den of Demons
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Rin, the last time you appeared on my gaming live stream was well received, you know.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Really? Ehehe, Rin is happy nya.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>So I decided to make a channel dedicated to streaming games. It would be called「Yohane’s Den of Demons」. Kukuku.... Good idea, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>When are you going to start it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Let’s see.... I would like to invite some guests, so maybe from next week.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Alright nya. What time are we going to do it next week?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh? Do you want to be a guest again?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eh? Isn’t Rin going to be a regular? If people like the streams with me in it, then Rin has to appear again! Also, the channel name should be「Yohane and Rin’s Home」 nya.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>What!? Putting you being a regular aside, I won’t change the channel name!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin doesn’t like “Den of Demons”, it sounds scary nya! Rin also won’t back down nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
